channel.title: Posts on Orange Days
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Orange Days

item.title: Heroes 3 tricks to extract more joy from the game
item.description: I love to play random maps in Heroes 3 (original complete edition with the amazing HD Launcher) against 7 original AI on Impossible difficulty, random choice of town. On top of that, my preferred mode of playing with a friend is Hot Seat. The following text is what keeps me enjoying this game after 20 years of playing and doing the same things over and over again. I remember coming across someone else’s saved games on our hostel’s LAN during my university days.
